# go-velobike

A Go client library for the API of the velobike.ru project.

An API style based on the best practices of [google/go-github](https://github.com/google/go-github).


## Supported methods
* GET /profile
* POST /profile/authorize
* GET /ride/parkings
* GET /ride/history

## Roadmap
* Add electric bikes
* GET /content/news
